alert.note: Alert for Stutsman (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 20 at 3:39PM CST until February 20 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. For the Winter Storm Watch, blizzard conditions possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches possible. * WHERE...Stutsman County * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 PM CST this evening. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late Tuesday night through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Prepare for possible blizzard conditions. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
